TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IJSVsaPersistSite

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because it is being deprecated in Visual Studio 2005; there will be no replacement for this feature. Please see the ICodeCompiler documentation for additional help.")

Docs.summary: Manages project persistence and stores and retrieves code and other items using save and load operations implemented by the host.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string LoadElement(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the code item to be loaded. This can be a null reference when loading the Project file.
Docs.summary: Gets the source string previously saved using the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaPersistSite.SaveElement%2A> method.
Docs.returns: Returns the contents of the source-code element associated with the name parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SaveElement (string name, string source);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SaveElement(string name, string source) cil managed

Docs.param: A name to associate with the specified source item. This can be a null reference when saving the Project file.
The source string for the item.
Docs.summary: Saves an arbitrary source string with a given name parameter, which can then be used in a call to the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaPersistSite.LoadElement%2A> method to reload the string.
